name: Shoot The Smart Duck
description:
Shoot The Smart Duck is an educational shooter game based on visual c++. You must answer the question as quick as you can. Don't get the wrong answer because you will gameover.

Features
  • 2 languages (English, Indonesian)
  • 4 different modes and questions
  • Questions are always updated
  • Online leaderboard
  • Simple gameplay
Requirements
  • Windows 7 32bit or above 
  • Microsoft Visual C++ 2017 Redistributable (included in the installer)
  • Internet connection
